name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 哔哩哔哩移除滚动广告Bilibili Remove Banner

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will remove the banner on the Bilibili website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 这个插件将会移除b站主页左上角的滚动展示广告，从而在主页上方显示更多的视频。This extension will remove the banner on the Bilibili main page in order to show more videos on the top of the page.
